plot: The dysfunctional life of a miserable young suburban couple is given the traditional sitcom treatment as the brazen husband goes toe-to-toe with a dangerous new ex-con neighbor.
title: Ain't So Funny
plot_es: The dysfunctional life of a miserable young suburban couple is given the traditional sitcom treatment as the brazen husband goes toe-to-toe with a dangerous new ex-con neighbor.
plot_en: The dysfunctional life of a miserable young suburban couple is given the traditional sitcom treatment as the brazen husband goes toe-to-toe with a dangerous new ex-con neighbor.
